text: The Unholy Garden is a 1931 American romantic drama movie directed by George Fitzmaurice and was based on the story by Ben Hecht and Charles MacArthur. It stars Ronald Coleman, Fay Wray, Estelle Taylor, Warren Hymer, Tully Marshall, Lawrence Grant, Henry Kolker and was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1931 drama movies Category:1930s American romance movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by George Fitzmaurice
title: The Unholy Garden
